`r paste("Page", subpage_number)`
========================================
```{r}
id <- paste("page", subpage_number, "iframe", sep = "-")
htmltools::tags$iframe(
  id = id,
  `data-src` = "https://colorado.rstudio.com/rsc/cole/my-bitcoin-report/",
  style = "min-width: 500px; min-height: 200px; width: 100%; height: 100%"
)
```
